In more severe cases of gynecomastia, surgery is often the most effective and lasting solution. While exercise and lifestyle changes can sometimes help reduce the appearance of gyno, they may not provide the comprehensive results that surgery can offer.

3. What is the recovery process like?

Recovery after gynecomastia surgery varies from person to person. Generally, patients can expect to return to non-strenuous activities within a week or two. Our team provides detailed post-operative instructions to support your healing process.
